channel.title: No Swim Zone
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast about male infertility and men's mental health
channel.itunes:author: Sean Tuck
channel.itunes:summary: Follow me as I deal with my infertility and navigate infertility treatment. My wife and I share our story and the stories of others, to support men and women going through their own infertility struggles.
channel.itunes:keywords: infertility, male infertility, health, mental health, fertility, men, men's issues, ivf, assisted reproduction, donor conception
channel.description: Follow me as I deal with my infertility and my wife and I navigate infertility treatment. We share our story of male infertility and the stories of others, to support men and women going through their own infertility struggles.

item.title: Ep 1: Welcome to the No Swim Zone
item.itunes:title: Welcome to the No Swim Zone
item.itunes:author: Sean Tuck
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 1! Welcome to our new podcasts, hope you like it. Helen joins me as we tell you what the podcast will be about and introduce ourselves a little.
item.itunes:summary: Episode 1! Welcome to our new podcasts, hope you like it. Helen joins me as we tell you what the podcast will be about and introduce ourselves a little.
item.description:
Hi, hope you enjoy the episode! This week we talked about what the podcast will be about, how me and Helen met, and why we started trying for a baby.

If you want to chat you can reach me at sean.noswimzone@gmail.com or @no_swim_zone on Instagram.
